Package ivory.ptc.driver

Class Summary
BuildAnchorTextInvertedIndex Driver to build anchor text inverted index.
ExtractSortedPseudoTestCollection Driver that extracts a set of pseudo queries and pseudo judgments according to a sampling criterion (Criterion).
XMLFormatJudgments Driver that formats the pseudo judgments and outputs an XML file that can be used directly for training.
XMLFormatJudgments.MyReducer  
XMLFormatQueries Driver that formats the pseudo queries and outputs an XML file that can be used directly for training.
XMLFormatQueries.MyReducer
